upgrades.name: Duck and Cover
upgrades.text: When this unit is defending against a Ranged attack, at the start of the Apply Dodge and Cover step, it may gain 1 Suppression Token.

upgrades.name: Endurance
upgrades.text: This unit may remove 1 Suppression token at the end of the Suppression Token.

upgrades.name: Into the Fray
upgrades.text: During the ACTIVATION PHASE, when an enemy unit starts its Activation within RANGE 1 of this unit, this unit may gain 1 Surge Token.

upgrades.name: Mission Objective
upgrades.text: When this unit attacks an enemy unit that is holding or contesting 1 or more Objective tokens, during the Reroll Dice Step, you may EXHAUST this card. If you do, this unit rerolls 1 attack die. /n/At the start of this unit's Activation, READY this card.

upgrades.name: On the Hunt
upgrades.text: When this unit is attacking a Trooper unit that has 1 or more Wound tokens, during the Roll Attack Dice Step, this unit may gain 1 AIM token.

upgrades.name: Protector
upgrades.text: When this unit uses GUARDIAN X, you may EXHAUST this card to cancel CRIT results with GUARDIAN X, as if they were HIT results. /n/Ready this card in the END PHASE.
